channel.title: RuneScape Timers
channel.description:
Hey, can you guys please give me the timers for all of these things.
How long does PvP Skull last? How long do you need to be in-active in the game for it to log you out? How long does Teleblocking delay last? How long does RuneScape auto save take? What is the item limit of a 317 (Emulous) what is the highest item ID that is spawned in a 317? What is the npc limit of a 317 (Emulous) what is the highest npc ID that is spawned in a 317? What is RuneScapes Melee EXP Rate? What is RuneScapes Magic EXP Rate? What is RuneScapes Range EXP Rate? What is RuneScapes Bone EXP Rate?
Also, how do I get Emulous to load drops in a cfg file and not in the configuration file like this;
[code=java] public static int[][] NPC_DROPS = {}; // { NPCID, ITEM ID, AMOUNT, RARITY } [/code]

item.title: RuneScape Timers
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

The item/npc limit could be found in the client your using.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Timers
item.dc:creator: @MareInTheMoon MareInTheMoon
item.description:
@MareInTheMoon wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:4, topic:437325”][quote author=MareInTheMoon link=topic=540034.msg3954100#msg3954100 date=1332579203]
Err… Runescape saves your game, autosaves would be too laggy, since they have tens of thousands online at once.
[/quote]
They do have different worlds which are hosted on different servers… but still, there is an efficient way of saving. I’m positive they don’t do a mass save because that could cause insane lag and also a possible server crash. Their update system is probably impossible to remake.[/quote]Thanks for basically restating the meaning of my post.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Timers
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Probably a simple statement would suffice.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Timers
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

Jc22493:

Teleblock differs depending on if the other player is using a protect prayer.

Yeah, but that would be hard to add? Wouldn’t it?

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Timers
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

[quote=“Skyro, post:1, topic:437325”]Hey, can you guys please give me the timers for all of these things.

How long does PvP Skull last?
How long do you need to be in-active in the game for it to log you out?
How long does Teleblocking delay last?
How long does RuneScape auto save take?
What is the item limit of a 317 (Emulous) what is the highest item ID that is spawned in a 317?
What is the npc limit of a 317 (Emulous) what is the highest npc ID that is spawned in a 317?
What is RuneScapes Melee EXP Rate?
What is RuneScapes Magic EXP Rate?
What is RuneScapes Range EXP Rate?
What is RuneScapes Bone EXP Rate?

Also, how do I get Emulous to load drops in a cfg file and not in the configuration file like this;

public static int[][] NPC_DROPS = {}; // { NPCID, ITEM ID, AMOUNT, RARITY } [/quote]

How long does PvP Skull last? 20 minutes, resetting upon attack.
How long do you need to be in-active in the game for it to log you out? 5 minutes.
How long does Teleblocking delay last? 5 minutes.
What is RuneScapes Melee EXP Rate? 4damage.
What is RuneScapes Magic EXP Rate? 4damage.
What is RuneScapes Range EXP Rate? 4*damage.
What is RuneScapes Bone EXP Rate? Depends on the bone.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

So can people help me out with this.

Thanks, would be really good.

item.description:

Err… Runescape saves your game, autosaves would be too laggy, since they have tens of thousands online at once.
[/quote]
They do have different worlds which are hosted on different servers… but still, there is an efficient way of saving. I’m positive they don’t do a mass save because that could cause insane lag and also a possible server crash. Their update system is probably impossible to remake.[/quote]i sincerely hope you’re not referring to flatfile saving

item.title: RuneScape Timers
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

MareInTheMoon:

Err… Runescape saves your game, autosaves would be too laggy, since they have tens of thousands online at once.

They do have different worlds which are hosted on different servers… but still, there is an efficient way of saving. I’m positive they don’t do a mass save because that could cause insane lag and also a possible server crash. Their update system is probably impossible to remake.

Read full topic
